Ok i made the shop and its working now thanks br3ndan and i made the wanneshop 78 heres the code

else if (NPCID == 551) { // shopkeeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 78; }

shop = 78	Barrows

the only problem now is when i click on him it doesnt open up shop does ny one kno why[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 13, 2008, 05:56:58 PM[/size][hr]ny one kno?
